venue.address_2: Corner of State and Pleasant Streets
venue.name: Richdale Food Store

item.description:
Witches (and goblins) night out in Newburyport!

 

What you need to know about this event:

  • Dress up in your fancy Witches or Goblins outfit come to Newburyport and have fun walking around town.
  • We will be enjoy merchant and restaurant hospitality while shopping and meeting your favorite witch or warlock.
  • Many participating businesses will be decorating their stores in the best of Halloween finery, serving light refreshments, having a costume contest and offerings.
  • Wear comfortable shoes as you will be walking around town.
  • Costumes are suggested you don’t have to dress up to attend, but if you do it will just add to the fun. So grab your best witch or warlock getup and come cast your spell in Newburyport.
  • This is an Adult Event For The Night.
  • Right now there are over 40 stores/restaurants (and they will be adding more) that will be joining in on the fun of this event.
  • Come to this event to hang around with some great friends, shop, get a bite to eat, check out some great costumes, and get/give some treats.
  • Bad weather will cancel this event please remember to check back before heading out to see if there are any updates.

TIME
Please note we will only wait for 15 minutes after scheduled meetup time to head out into the night, if you are running late, get lost or not able to find us call the Meetup phone at 978-304-2811.

We look forward to getting spooked with you at this event!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in front of the entrance
item.name: Witches (and goblins) night out......
